name: Cardinal Health, Inc.
summary: Cardinal Health, Inc. is a leading American multinational healthcare services company specializing in the distribution of pharmaceuticals and medical products, as well as manufacturing medical and surgical products for hospitals and healthcare providers. Headquartered in Dublin, Ohio, Cardinal Health serves over 100,000 locations and operates one of the largest radiopharmacy networks in the U.S. The company is ranked 14th on the Fortune 500 and is a critical link in the healthcare supply chain.
